packs.pack_description: Gives the title on the main menu screen its look from Minecraft: Java Edition.
Gives Explosion particles their texture from Minecraft: Java Edition.
Gives all Map item variants their textures from Minecraft: Java Edition.
Gives the Ender Dragon's projectile its texture from Minecraft: Java Edition.
Gives the Dried Kelp item its texture from Minecraft: Java Edition.
Changes Stripped Spruce Logs' side texture to match its texture from Minecraft: Java Edition.
Gives the Creeper its texture from Minecraft: Dungeons.
Gives Dirt its texture from Minecraft: Dungeons.
Gives Stone its texture from Minecraft: Dungeons (with 12 texture variants).
Gives Terracotta its texture from Minecraft: Dungeons.
Recolors and remodels Endermen to have the same palette and size as they do in 'Super Smash Bros Ultimate' .
Gives the Emerald its texture from old legacy console editions of Minecraft.
Gives the Snowball its texture from old legacy console editions of Minecraft.
